text: kya tumane yah samajh rakha hai ki tum aise hee chhod die jaoge, haalaanki allaah ne abhee un logon ko chhaanta hee nahin, jinhonne tumamen se jihaad kiya aur allaah aur usake rasool aur mominon ko chhodakar kisee ko ghanishth mitr nahin banaaya? tum jo kuchh bhee karate ho, allaah usakee khabar rakhata hai
